document.heading: Day Care Policy Act of 1979 Amendment Temporary Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-57, the “Day Care Policy Act of 1979 Amendment Temporary Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-305. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 29, 1987 and October 13, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 26, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-90 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
